trans-unit.source: Manage Azure Redis Cache with Azure PowerShell | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure Redis Cache with Azure PowerShell | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to perform administrative tasks for Azure Redis Cache using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to perform administrative tasks for Azure Redis Cache using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Manage Azure Redis Cache with Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure Redis Cache with Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to create, update and delete an Azure Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to create, update and delete an Azure Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you can use Windows PowerShell with Azure Resource Manager, you need the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you can use Windows PowerShell with Azure Resource Manager, you need the following:

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell, Version 3.0 or 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell, Version 3.0 or 4.0.

trans-unit.source: To find the version of Windows PowerShell, type:`$PSVersionTable` and verify the value of `PSVersion` is 3.0 or 4.0.
trans-unit.target: To find the version of Windows PowerShell, type:`$PSVersionTable` and verify the value of `PSVersion` is 3.0 or 4.0.

trans-unit.source: To install a compatible version, see [Windows Management Framework 3.0 ](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) or [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=40855).
trans-unit.target: To install a compatible version, see [Windows Management Framework 3.0 ](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) or [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=40855).

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell version 0.8.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell version 0.8.0 or later.

trans-unit.source: To install the latest version and associate it with your Azure subscription, see [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).
trans-unit.target: To install the latest version and associate it with your Azure subscription, see [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is designed for Windows PowerShell beginners.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is designed for Windows PowerShell beginners.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell, see [Getting Started with Windows PowerShell](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh857337.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information about Windows PowerShell, see [Getting Started with Windows PowerShell](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh857337.aspx).

trans-unit.source: To get detailed help for any cmdlet you see in this tutorial, use the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To get detailed help for any cmdlet you see in this tutorial, use the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get help for the Add-AzureAccount cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get help for the Add-AzureAccount cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.target: A simple Azure PowerShell script for the Redis Cache
